text:
@Keir_Starmer You have been an appalling LOTO to date.

Medals, exit strategies, and... too much silence on covid-19 already.

You cannot deny at this point that the Govt has lied about PPE... and more. Or deny that their lying has led to thousands of deaths.

Your silence is complicity.
